title: (1) Andernach, Looking Upstream from Road from Namedy, with Town Walls, Chapel of the Annunziatenkloster, Watch Tower and Four-Towered Liebfraukirche; (2) Same Scene with the Riverside Crane; (3) View from Landing-Stage Downstream towards Leutsdorf
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
